flawed_nl_solution:
Since 1 hour is 60 minutes, 20 minutes is 20/60=1/2 of an hour.
Eating 3 potatoes per 20 minutes is 3/(1/2)=<<3/(1/2)=6>>6 potatoes per hour.
At 6 potatoes per hour, it will take Jason 27/6=9/2 hours to eat all of the potatoes.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1/3, not 1/2. It appears there was an off-by-one error in the fraction.
